title: How to Create Care Instruction Templates
description: Give customers professional after-care instructions that reduce callbacks and show expertise.
requirements: Knowledge of your services and maintenance needs
A way to deliver instructions (text, email, or print)

steps.title: List your main services
steps.description: Identify which services need care instructions.
substeps: Think about services where customers need to maintain the work
Example: Paint jobs (curing time, cleaning), new installations (break-in period), landscaping (watering schedule)
Prioritize services that generate the most callbacks
steps.tip: Start with the service that gets the most 'is this normal?' calls.

steps.title: Use ChatGPT to create the instructions
substeps: Type: 'Write care and maintenance instructions for a customer who just got [your service]. Include: what to do in the first 24-48 hours, ongoing maintenance, what's normal vs concerning, and when to call a professional.'
Review and add your specific recommendations

steps.title: Make them easy to scan
steps.description: Customers won't read walls of text.
steps.tip: Think of it like a receipt â€” scannable, key points obvious.

steps.title: Create templates for each service
substeps: Save each set of instructions as a template
Name them clearly: 'Care Instructions - Interior Paint'
Store in Google Docs or your notes app
Update as you learn what customers need to know

steps.title: Deliver instructions automatically
substeps: Send via text with the job completion summary
Or email as a PDF attachment
Or print and leave with the customer
Add to your job completion checklist so you never forget

successMessage: You now have professional care instructions! Customers feel taken care of and callbacks decrease.
proTips: Care instructions reduce 'is this normal?' calls significantly
They also set you up for future business: 'Schedule your annual maintenance...'
Include your contact info at the bottom in case they have questions
